prompt: Cinematic close-up of a digital flip clock shifting to 6:00, harsh alarm beep implied, mid-tone cut, dawn ambient light, controlled handheld realism, no dialogue.
negative_prompt: digital overlays, bright colors, visible people talking

prompt: Medium shot of a woman in her mid-30s sitting up instantly in bed, hair untouched, posture upright, shoulders tense, hand reaching for a pill bottle; minimal bedroom decor; drone bed implied.
negative_prompt: smiling, dramatic camera whip, exaggerated acting

prompt: Close-up of pill placed on tongue followed by a dry swallow, no water nearby, throat tightening, strained gulp audible, muted clinical tone.
negative_prompt: water glass visible, cinematic hero lighting, blood

prompt: Close-up of the same woman drinking water with mechanical relief, quick glass clink, minimal background, neutral palette, no dialogue.
Extreme close-up of her hand holding the phone trembling for half a second, controlled breathing audible, micro-flutter emphasized.
negative_prompt: motion blur, jittery camera, visible text pop-ups

prompt: Medium shot in kitchen: woman weighs food precisely, efficient slightly rigid movements, precise utensil clinks, neutral countertops, restrained color grade.
negative_prompt: smiling cooking show energy, messy spills, vibrant colors

prompt: Long shot tying shoes, standing with breath held; exits with door closing exactly on time and clean latch click; morning neutrality.
Medium shot in dim interior with close-up moments on clenched jaw, mask intact and strained; cyclical drone presence, subdued movement.
Close-up ceiling where a bead of water forms, hangs, and falls; isolated sharp plink sync; muted color temperature.
Close-up of her face showing a tiny flinch before recognition, subtle breath hitch, restrained expression, soft key light.
Medium shot as she grabs a mop, handle scrape audible, controlled urgency, muted interior palette, no dialogue.
negative_prompt: slapstick movement, wide smiles, bright decorations

prompt: Close-up mop sweeping water across floor, wet swoosh under persistent drip rhythm, tight framing on motion.
negative_prompt: foam or soap suds, excessive motion blur

prompt: Flashback tone: bathroom at night, woman bent over sink gripping edge, sharp internal inhale, desaturated grading, slight vignette.
Medium shot she steadies herself, breath controlled and forced, shoulders square, sparse background.
Close-up bucket placed precisely under drip with dull thud, careful hands, muted kitchen/bath setting.
Flashback tone: extreme close-up of neck pulse racing under skin, rapid thump-thump, desaturated and slightly grainy.
Close-up whiteboard note reading 'Check level @ 7pm.' She checks it off with marker tick, controlled and precise, neutral interior lighting.
negative_prompt: messy handwriting, extra notes, colorful stickers

prompt: Extreme close-up fingers tapping bedsheet rapidly yet controlled, anxious rhythm synced with drip, shallow depth of field.
Measured montage: pill, mop, chart, empty bucket, folded towel. Controlled cuts, steady framing, metallic rhythm building, consistent muted palette, silent visual essay style.
negative_prompt: fast frantic edits, subtitles, text overlays

prompt: Medium shot late night desk with presentation titled 'Final Version (v12)' onscreen, unsaved dot blinking, laptop fan hum implied, tired posture.
negative_prompt: busy office, multiple people, bright daylight

prompt: Drop hits laptop screen, sharp electronic tap; tight framing on impact and pixel ripple.
Immediate wipe of laptop screen with towel, efficient motion, neutral palette, no dialogue.
Flashback: seated on floor gripping hair, back to wall, internal gurgle cut short, desaturated and grainy, steady framing.
Close-up placing a second bucket beside the first with towels stacked nearby; second dull thud; dim interior with practical light.
Medium shot on sofa; drop hits TV screen causing brief distortion, crackle, electronic pop; calm but alert posture.
Sequence: wipe TV, apply hairdryer, press remote to reboot; efficient, minimal movements; hairdryer whirr blending into score.
Flashback: empty wall with broken photo frame hook, hollow room tone implied, desaturated stillness.
Close-up chest breathing shallow and quick, synced to faster drip rhythm, minimal wardrobe, neutral lighting.
Extreme close-up hand rubbing neck knot; momentary relief then strain, high-pitched score layer implied.
Close-up bucket overflowing, water spilling across floor; uncontrolled slosh captured with restrained camera.
Close-up smartwatch as she glances once and turns away, subtle alert tone ignored, neutral wrist movement.
Medium kitchen shot making breakfast while water spreads across floor; familiar utensil sounds under growing stream; calm demeanor.
Close-up drop hitting her shoulder, fabric tap audible; she remains composed; neutral wardrobe.
Medium shot deploying towels and mop then reaching for umbrella; frantic rustle but controlled actions.
Close-up umbrella opening indoors; water hits fabric with metallic snap leading to muffled rain, muted kitchen background.
Pouring coffee under the umbrella while holding for profound silence, minimal movement, soft kitchen light.
Flashback: mirror reflection blank and hollow, tone drops out, monochrome desaturation, steady camera.
Medium shot water moving across floor, her bare feet feeling it, she stops; continuous stream audible, neutral framing.
She drops the umbrella and observes mop, buckets, towels; umbrella clatter echoes; composed posture.
Transition move passing through her gaze into darkness with a deep whoosh; abstract camera move into black, no added imagery.
Minimal dark space with a sustained cello note and subtle electronics emerging; abstract light textures only, no figures.
Diagram forming imperfectly: heart, knot, two figures, old photo; slight misalignment, monochrome lines on dark field, slow drawing motion.
Diagram shrinks as camera ascends into attic space, smooth upward movement, muted palette, dust motes drifting.
Memory fragment: tangled frayed wires lit by single beam of light, overlapping indistinct whispers implied, slow drifting camera.
All elements merge into a single drop suspended mid-air; stillness dominant; neutral lighting; silence.
Drop dissolves into vapor, plink stops; restrained dissolve motion, dark background, minimal particles.
Pull back to woman in kitchen with quiet recognition; slow dolly out, soft minor chord mood, mop and buckets visible unused.
Morning light enters room; she removes main bucket while mop remains unused; slow plink returns; composed motion, clean framing.
